title: Starry Night
description: A famous painting by Vincent van Gogh, depicting a night sky filled with swirling clouds and bright stars.

title: Mona Lisa
description: An iconic portrait by Leonardo da Vinci, known for its enigmatic smile and detailed background.

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: A surrealist painting by Salvador Dal√≠, featuring melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape.

title: The Scream
description: A haunting expressionist artwork by Edvard Munch, capturing a figure in distress against a vivid sky.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: A captivating portrait by Johannes Vermeer, often referred to as the 'Mona Lisa of the North.'

title: The Birth of Venus
description: A Renaissance masterpiece by Sandro Botticelli, depicting the goddess Venus emerging from the sea.

title: The Night Watch
description: A dramatic group portrait by Rembrandt, showcasing a militia company in action.

title: The Kiss
description: A romantic painting by Gustav Klimt, featuring a couple embraced in a golden, decorative style.

title: Guernica
description: A powerful anti-war painting by Pablo Picasso, depicting the horrors of the bombing of Guernica.

title: The Last Supper
description: A monumental fresco by Leonardo da Vinci, capturing the moment Jesus announces his betrayal.

title: The School of Athens
description: A fresco by Raphael, depicting philosophers and scholars in a grand architectural setting.

title: Water Lilies
description: A series of paintings by Claude Monet, capturing the beauty of his garden pond in Giverny.

title: The Creation of Adam
description: A fresco by Michelangelo, depicting the biblical creation story on the Sistine Chapel ceiling.

title: The Garden of Earthly Delights
description: A triptych by Hieronymus Bosch, filled with surreal and fantastical imagery.

title: The Thinker
description: A bronze sculpture by Auguste Rodin, depicting a man deep in thought.

title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa
description: A famous woodblock print by Hokusai, showcasing a towering wave and Mount Fuji in the background.
